DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Alcon MPDS safe effective silicone hydrogel soft hydrogel contact lens wearer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Investigational Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine Alcon Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution ( MPDS ) safe effective silicone hydrogel soft hydrogel contact lens wearer .
DOC.criteria: Silicone hydrogel soft contact lens wearer wear lens daily wear ( i.e . disinfect lenses every night ) . Patient must able read . Vision correctable 20/30 good contact lens . Sensitivity multipurpose solution . Using topical ocular OTC prescribe topical ocular medication . History current ocular infection ocular inflammatory event . Ocular surgery within past year . With medical condition use medication cause ocular side effect . Participation investigational study within past 30 day .
